name: finpilot
description: Enterprise Finance Platform - Expense Management Application

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.db:setup: cd server && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed

author: FinPilot Team
